room_title: Escape room "Salem" by The Exit Rooms in Buffalo
review: We did the Salem room and it was awesome! This was my first time doing an escape room and I will definitely do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Salem" by The Exit Rooms in Buffalo
review: SALEM was an amazing room. We loved the puzzles and decor, we even broke the record for fastest escape. We can't wait to go back for the other room. I highly recommend escaping from these rooms!
